b'Ryo': b'During the turbulent end of the Tokugawa era, many children became war orphans. One of these orphans, a nameless son of a samurai, ends up meeting Ryouma Sakamoto, a man working against the Bakufu government. Impressed by the orphan\'s skill with a blade, Ryouma gives him the name "Ryo" and lets him travel by his side.\n\n[Written by MAL Rewrite]'
[b'Arve Rezzle: Kikaijikake no Yousei-tachi', b'Little Witch Academia', b'Death Billiards']
